1 tablespoon olive oil,1 pound 93% lean ground beef,2 teaspoons taco seasoning mix,1 teaspoon chili powder,1 teaspoon ground cumin,1 teaspoon smoked paprika,1 teaspoon garlic granules,1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper, or to taste,1/2 teaspoon salt, or to taste,1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste,4 cups potatoes, thawed (see Note),1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes and green chilies,2 ounces heddar cheese, shredded,2 green onions, sliced,fresh cilantro sprigs for garnish (optional),,
